pullRequest.title: Change profile stack element data structure
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please answer these questions before submitting pull request


Why submit this pull request?


 Bug fix


 New feature provided


 Improve performance


Related issues
#4104



Bug fix


GraphQL cannot support self reference, cannot build query request.


How to fix?
Change profile stack element using single level list, use id and parentId to reference parent element.

commit.message: Change profile stack element to single level, not using tree

nodes.bodyText: This could be replaced by simplier foreach.

commit.message: change build list using simpler foreach
